availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Clark (Hancock County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of William C. Clark and Mary Clark. Married to Mary I. Voiles Clark on December 30, 1855. Father of Frank Clark, Marcus Clark, and Retus Clark. Resident of Hancock County in 1850.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 592; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Indian Creek, p. 1; Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Hancock County, Kentucky, December 30, 1855; KYR-0001-029-0542.
